content: zoom hat hat season is here run or zoom to your stash and grab two fingering weight yarns along with something fluffy such as mohair or something equally haze-y cast on and zoom before you know it you have a delightfully cozy hat not only does this recipe encourage you to play with mixing color and texture it s a wonderful stash-buster too happy knitting finished measurements approx 10 5 tall and 19 5 circumference yarn two strands of fingering held with a strand of something fluffy think mohair or something equally haze-y such as an alpaca fluff 3 strands total tools 3 stitch markers 1 bor marker and 2 contrasting markers and tapestry needle needles size 6 16 circular needle and dpns or size to obtain gauge gauge approx 20 sts over 4 directions co 100 sts pm and join in the round being careful not to twist your sts k1 *p2 k2 repeat from* to last 3 sts p2 k1 for 4 25 switch to stockinette for another 4 25 or so at this point you could stay with your size 6 needle or go up to a 7 if you want your fabric a little extra drapey next round decrease 1 st so you have 99 sts place a contrasting stitch marker every 33 sts finishing knitting this round begin decreases ⁣ round 1 *ssk k to 3 sts before contrasting m k2tog k1 repeat from * to bor m you have just decreased 6 sts round 2 knit⁣ repeat last two rnds 2 more times for a shorter crown or 3 more times for a longer crown then repeat round 1 until 4 sts between each m remain cut yarn thread tapestry needle and draw sts closed pom or no pom it s up to you www dimondlaine com 1 zoom hat version 1 abbreviations approx approximately bor beginning of round co cast⁣ on k knit⁣ k2tog knit 2 stitches together m marker p purl pm place marker repeat repeat round s round s ssk slip two stitches
